useCase.name: Get Average Lending Duration Per Book

mainSequence.step: Librarian sends a request to get average lending duration per book.
LendingController calls LendingService to get average lending duration per book.
LendingService retrieves average lending duration per book from LendingRepository.
LendingService maps the results to LendingAvgPerBookView objects.
LendingController sends back Iterable of LendingAvgPerBookView to Librarian.
